# Moodle Developer Documentation MCP Server Requirements
# Core MCP framework
mcp>=1.0.0

# HTTP client for web requests
aiohttp>=3.8.0

# HTML parsing for documentation scraping
beautifulsoup4>=4.11.0

# Additional dependencies (already included with Python 3.10+)
# - asyncio (built-in)
# - json (built-in)
# - logging (built-in)
# - re (built-in)
# - typing (built-in)
# - urllib.parse (built-in)
# - sys (built-in)
# - pydantic (included with mcp)
